edu.ncsu.csc316.rentals.priority_queue

Class MinHeap

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.rentals.priority_queue.MinHeap

  • public class MinHeap
extends java.lang.Object
    A min heap data structure; used to implement an adaptable priority queue i.e. has location-aware elements.
    Author:
    Noah Benveniste

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MinHeap()
      Constructs an empty minheap

      • upHeap

        public void upHeap(int i)
        Performs up heap operation to preserve heap ordering property when necessary
        Parameters:
        i - the position of the new element in the heap

      • deleteMin

        public Vertex deleteMin()
        Gets the vertex with the highest priority from the queue
        Returns:
        the vertex with the highest priority (lowest cumulative cost)

      • downHeap

        public void downHeap(int m)
        Performs the downHeap operation to preserve heap ordering property when necessary
        Parameters:
        m - the position of the new element in the heap

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the heap is empty
        Returns:
        true if it is, false otherwise
